title: Turds Of A Feather, Expert Weed Tips 11.12.21
itunes:title: Turds Of A Feather, Expert Weed Tips 11.12.21
description:
In episode 1029, Jack and Miles are joined by co-host of the How To Do The Pot podcast Ellen Scanlon to discuss The pursuit of seasonal retail workers, Turds of a feather …, Wait, did people think having a beard meant you were more dominant and manly?, a MoviePass revival and more!

  1. The pursuit of seasonal retail workers
  2. Which Stores Are the Most Desperate to Hire Holiday Workers?
  3. Wow, a Lot of 2022 Republican Candidates Have Been Accused of Assaulting or Threatening to Murder Someone
  4. Wait, did people think having a beard meant you were more dominant and manly?
  5. MoviePass revival?
  6. After MoviePass Rumors, The Internet May Have Figured Out The Truth Of The Countdown
  7. MoviePass Is Coming Back, Let Chaos Reign


Listen: Freefalling by Freaks and Geeks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
